K12D0499_H0464:354a-1: a'arya badzra p'a ni n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a t'a l'a n'a ma tantra; bod skad du /
K12D0499_H0464:354a-2: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba'i rgyud /
K12D0499_H0464:354a-3: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0499_H0464:354b-0: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus @354b gcig na /
K12D0499_H0464:354b-1: bcom ldan 'das sa 'og rim pa bdun klu'i rgyal
K12D0499_H0464:354b-2: po'i gnas na rin po che'i khri la bzhugs te
K12D0499_H0464:354b-3: / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K12D0499_H0464:354b-5: rigs ldan la sogs te klu rnams dang /
K12D0499_H0464:354b-6: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams dang thabs cig ste /
K12D0499_H0464:354b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g-yas pa nas
K12D0499_H0464:354b-8: 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye bas 'jig rten
K12D0499_H0464:354b-10: ltas byung bas 'jig rten pa rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas brgyal bar gyur te //
K12D0499_H0464:354b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K12D0499_H0464:354b-13: ltas byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen ci lags /
K12D0499_H0464:354b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0499_H0464:354b-16: bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa las grub pas 'bras bu yang tshad med kyi /
K12D0499_H0464:354b-17: byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba las bslang du gsol /
K12D0499_H0464:354b-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i
K12D0499_H0464:354b-19: thugs ka nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye
K12D0499_H0464:354b-20: ste; 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis brgyal ba las
K12D0499_H0464:354b-21: bslangs so // de nas 'jig rten pa rnams kyis ched du brjod pa /
K12D0499_H0464:354b-22: ae ma thabs chen thugs rje yis //
K12D0499_H0464:354b-23: 'jig rten thams cad brgyal gyur na; ;thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis //
K12D0499_H0464:354b-24: brgyal ba thams cad bslangs par gyur //
K12D0499_H0464:354b-25: de nas 'jig rten ba rnams sa 'og rim pa
K12D0499_H0464:355a-0: bdun gyi klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'dus par @355a
K12D0499_H0464:355a-1: *// gyur nas gsol ba btab pa /
K12D0499_H0464:355a-2: sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin las can //
K12D0499_H0464:355a-3: ston pa bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
K12D0499_H0464:355a-4: 'jig rten rnams la phan gdags phyir //
K12D0499_H0464:355a-5: rdul bral chos rnams bshad du gsol /
K12D0499_H0464:355a-7: badzra aa bhi sh'inytsa badzra p'a ni h'um/
K12D0499_H0464:355a-8: zhes gsungs bas snod dang ldan par byas so //
K12D0499_H0464:355a-9: de nas klu rgyal po rnams 'khrugs so //
K12D0499_H0464:355a-10: shin tu yid 'khrugs nas kha g-yab cing brang brdungs te /
K12D0499_H0464:355a-11: kye ma kyi hud bdag klu'i gnas dang /
K12D0499_H0464:355a-13: 'jig rten pas 'phrog pas 'jig rten pa rnams brlag
K12D0499_H0464:355a-14: par bya'o zhes zer nas klu'i kha'i rlangs pas 'jig
K12D0499_H0464:355a-15: rten pa rnams la mdze'i nad btang ngo //
K12D0499_H0464:355a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad sel ba zhes
K12D0499_H0464:355a-17: bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thugs
K12D0499_H0464:355a-18: ka'i dpal be'u las nad sel ba'i 'od /
K12D0499_H0464:355a-19: zhal nas kyang badzra da ya zhes bya ba'i sngags
K12D0499_H0464:355a-20: dang bcas te byung ba me long la has btab
K12D0499_H0464:355a-22: de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis klu bran rnams
K12D0499_H0464:355a-23: bskul nas la la tshu [?] na [?] sa zhugs
K12D0499_H0464:355a-24: so // la la dbang po'i sgo nas zhugs so //
K12D0499_H0464:355a-25: la la rus pa nas zhugs pa la bcom ldan
K12D0499_H0464:355a-26: 'das kyis dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba'i ting nge
K12D0499_H0464:355a-27: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la dbugs kyis bsregs
K12D0499_H0464:355a-28: so // dbang po la zhugs pa dang /
K12D0499_H0464:355b-0: rus pa la zhugs pa sreg pa'i @355b 'khor los bcom mo //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-1: de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams cher 'khrugs nas bcom
K12D0499_H0464:355b-2: ldan 'das nyid la snang ba re re chad nas
K12D0499_H0464:355b-3: lus la dkri bas byang chub kyi sems dang ldan
K12D0499_H0464:355b-5: de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis bstod pa /
K12D0499_H0464:355b-6: 'jig rten 'di na klu rgyal mthu chen yang //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-7: bcom ldan brgya yi ba spu'i char mi phod //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-8: de na bcom ldan 'gro ba skyob pa la //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-9: klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis rtag tu bstod //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-10: rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
K12D0499_H0464:355b-11: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12D0499_H0464:355b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes
K12D0499_H0464:355b-13: rdo rje 'chang la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal
K12D0499_H0464:355b-15: ser sna'i dbang gis dbul gyur pa //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-16: nor rnams ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-17: mdun gyi phyag na rdo rje yi //

K12D0499_H0464:355b-21: snying gar 'od zer dag gis ni //

K12D0499_H0464:355b-23: ye shes sems dpas dzambha la'i //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-24: sngags ni zlas pa nyid du bsgom //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-25: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-27: nor gyis rgya mtsho gang bar 'gyur //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-28: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba btab pa /
K12D0499_H0464:355b-29: nyes pa shin tu phra mo la //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-30: grags dang rnyed pa'i don du ni //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-31: 'jig rten gnod byed sgrub byed pa //
K12D0499_H0464:355b-32: thog ser zlog pa bshad du gsol //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-2: rab gnas gzhung dang mthun par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-4: rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas pa bri //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-5: rtsibs la lha srin snying po bri; ;kh'am dha /
K12D0499_H0464:356a-13: dbus su sngags mkhan bri bar bya //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-14: de nas thod pa'i nang du gzhug /
K12D0499_H0464:356a-15: thod pa mchod rten 'og tu mnan //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-16: snying po'i 'od kyis sngags mkhan dang //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-17: lha srin 'khor dang bcas pa dgug /
K12D0499_H0464:356a-18: de la thun gyis brab par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-20: ston pa'i nga rgyal ldan pa la //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-21: mthe bong dang ni mthe chung la //

K12D0499_H0464:356a-23: mthe chung phyag na rdo rje yi //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-24: thugs nas phyag na rdo rje ni //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-25: zhags pa lcags kyu thogs pa spro //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-26: snying gi lcags kyus dgug pa dang //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-27: mgrin pa zhags pas bcing bar bya //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-28: mthe bong phyag na rdo rje yi //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-29: rdo rje las ni rdo rje spro //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-30: bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-31: ba spu'i gshis na rdo rje 'phro //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-32: nam mkha' thams cad rdo rjer grub //
K12D0499_H0464:356a-33: yungs kar rdo rjer bskyed la brab //

K12D0499_H0464:356b-10: mug shas che bas chags pa dang zhe sdang yang

K12D0499_H0464:356b-13: chags pa'i dbang gis chags pa la gnas pa'i lus la zhugs nas mi gtong ba'o //

K12D0499_H0464:356b-16: reg pa tsam gyis nad skyed do //
K12D0499_H0464:356b-18: steng sgo gsum nas zhugs nas lus kyi bcud za bar byed do //

K12D0499_H0464:356b-24: n'a ga bi d'a r'a n'a dza:/

K12D0499_H0464:356b-26: sbyor ba gsum la legs gnas pas //

K12D0499_H0464:357a-6: ha ra ha ra n'a g'a n'am/

K12D0499_H0464:357a-26: sha ni skam zhing rus pa na //

K12D0499_H0464:358b-19: sngags rgyal gsungs pas skrag 'gyur ba //
K12D0499_H0464:358b-20: ngo mtshar 'di ni shin tu lhag //
K12D0499_H0464:358b-22: de nas rang rang gi srog snying ston pa la phul nas bran gyi tshul du gnas so //
K12D0499_H0464:358b-23: rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
K12D0499_H0464:358b-24: bcos dka' ba'i nad zlog pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12D0499_H0464:358b-25: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes
K12D0499_H0464:358b-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa dang phyag byas
K12D0499_H0464:358b-28: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchog /
K12D0499_H0464:358b-29: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol /
K12D0499_H0464:358b-30: de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos; ;gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //
K12D0499_H0464:358b-31: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing //
K12D0499_H0464:358b-32: dbang bskur ba yang ma thob na //
K12D0499_H0464:358b-33: bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub bo //
K12D0499_H0464:358b-34: de bas da ni bshad bya ba //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-1: bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhir bgyi //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-2: thig bzhi dag dang ldan gyur pas //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-3: cha chen bzhi ru btab byas na //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-4: shar gyi cha chen dang por ni //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-5: bzhir bgos dang po lte ba dang //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-6: gnyis pa padma ral gri gnyis //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-7: gsum pa lha yi snam bu 'o //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-8: de nas tshon ni dgye bar bya //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-10: padma sngon po ral gri sngon //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-11: lha snam nag la rdo rje'i sgo //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-12: bzhi ni dkar po bri bar bya //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-13: sgo yi phyi rol kha dog nag /
K12D0499_H0464:359a-14: me ri 'bar ba bri bar bya //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-15: de la rdo rje phreng bas bskor //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-16: mda' dang phur bu bcu drug la //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-17: tshon skud sngon po bri bar bya //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-18: dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma la //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-19: klu chen phyed gzugs sbrul mgo can //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-20: rdzogs par byas nas rnal 'byor ni //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-21: cho ga bzhin du gnyis ka yi //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-22: rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin du bskyed //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-23: dang po bla ma'i spyan sngar ni //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-24: phyag 'tshal la sogs bdun rnam dag /
K12D0499_H0464:359a-25: de nas ye shes sems dpa' la //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-26: me tog gtor zhing bstod pa bya //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-27: phyag 'tshal bskor ba bdun rnam dag /
K12D0499_H0464:359a-28: byas nas ye shes dbab par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-29: gnas gsum ye ge gsum bsams la //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-30: sngags 'di yang ni brjod par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-31: a'a be sha ya stambha ya r'a r'a ts'a la ya ts'a la ya h'um a'a aom dzee:/
K12D0499_H0464:359a-32: de nas dkyil 'khor bstan byas la //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-33: rig pa'i dbang ni cho ga bzhin //
K12D0499_H0464:359a-34: de nas sngags kyi rjes gnang sbyin //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-0: rnal 'byor snying ga'i sa bon @359b las; ;sngags kyi 'od kyis ye shes bskul //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-1: ye shes ljags las 'od byung las //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-2: snod gyur lce la thim par bsam //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-3: bsgrub pa'i rdzas kyi bkra shis brjod //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-4: rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0499_H0464:359b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes
K12D0499_H0464:359b-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas
K12D0499_H0464:359b-8: snying po kun la phan gdags dang //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-9: sangs rgyas bstan la gzhug don du //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-10: gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya ba ni //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-11: rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-12: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-13: sems can kun la phan don du //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-14: gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya ba ni //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-15: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-16: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-17: theg pa che la smod pa dang //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-18: de sgrub pa la snying nas brnyas //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-19: sgrub pa 'di ni brtsam par bya; ;de la ri
K12D0499_H0464:359b-20: rab kyi 'og na las kyi gnod sbyin gyi lus
K12D0499_H0464:359b-21: blangs la gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi yod pa /
K12D0499_H0464:359b-22: gdong dang po bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags zlos pa /
K12D0499_H0464:359b-23: gnyis pa rang gi srog snying bzla ba /
K12D0499_H0464:359b-24: gsum pa na me lce'i dbugs 'byung /
K12D0499_H0464:359b-25: bzhi pa na sha dang khrag za ba yong /
K12D0499_H0464:359b-26: de sgrub pa'i thabs bshad kyi /
K12D0499_H0464:359b-27: legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig /
K12D0499_H0464:359b-29: sngags kyi rgyal po 'bum bzlas la //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-31: de yi steng du khrag chen gyis //
K12D0499_H0464:359b-33: btson dong tshul du bri bar bya //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-0: @360a *// dar sngon de yi nang du bting //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-1: dbus su mi yi sha dang khrag /
K12D0499_H0464:360a-2: dang po khyi ste gnyis pa phag /
K12D0499_H0464:360a-3: gsum par rna can zangs gtsug phud //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-4: lnga par skad can drug par ra; ;bdun par skye gnyis brgyad par glang //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-5: g-yas kyi phyogs nas bskor ba 'o //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-6: ma he lug dang spre 'u dang //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-7: g-yon gyi phyogs nas bskor ba 'o //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-8: de ni dbul ba'i dam tshig go /
K12D0499_H0464:360a-9: khrag dang dug dang ske tshe yis //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-10: nam gyi phyed kyi dus dag tu //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-11: dur khrod ras la 'di ltar bri //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-12: zhal brgyad phyag stong yang na bcu //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-13: zhal bzhi dang po zhi ba ste //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-14: gnyis pa dmar po chu srin no //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-15: gsum pa khro nag yid dang khro //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-16: bzhi pa yi dvags mgo yin no //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-17: skra ni gyen brdzes zhal dang mtshungs //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-18: sprul pa bya rgod khra dang spyang //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-19: de yi mgo can bri bar bya; ;dgug gzhug dbang ni bskrad par bya'o //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-20: 'di ni bsten pa'i dam tshig go /
K12D0499_H0464:360a-21: bsnyen pa'i dam tshig gnyis dag gis //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-22: gsum rgyal dag las shes par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-23: aom yaksha ha sa ha sa da ra da ra h'um/
K12D0499_H0464:360a-24: khra dang spyang ki khyi la sogs //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-26: de nas mchod pa'i dam rdzas kun //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-27: bsgrub bya'i rdzas dang bsres byas la //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-28: gzugs brnyan byas la thod par gzhug /
K12D0499_H0464:360a-29: mar ngo gnod sbyin gzugs kyis mchod //
K12D0499_H0464:360a-30: aom yaksha m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
K12D0499_H0464:360a-31: aa pra ti ha ba la ba r'a kra m'a ya phat/
K12D0499_H0464:360a-32: sarba sha tr'um sam gha bi n'a sha ka r'a
K12D0499_H0464:360b-0: ya @360b phat; n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra
K12D0499_H0464:360b-1: p'a ni r'a:dzny'a pa ya ti m'a ra ya tsitta
K12D0499_H0464:360b-2: la phat/ des kyang grub par ma gyur na //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-3: gzugs brnyan rdul la sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-4: las skyes gzugs brnyan gong bur gzhug /
K12D0499_H0464:360b-5: des kyang grub par ma gyur na //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-6: aom yaksha m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
K12D0499_H0464:360b-7: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
K12D0499_H0464:360b-9: phyag gi rdo rjes bsnun par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-10: des kyang grub par ma gyur na //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-11: n'i l'am ba sa n'a ya phat/
K12D0499_H0464:360b-12: stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ngo mtshar nas ched du brjod pa /
K12D0499_H0464:360b-14: zung du 'brel bar gnas gyur pa //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-15: yam las rlung ste pam las pad; ;'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-18: gnod sbyin sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12D0499_H0464:360b-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang la gsol ba btab pa /
K12D0499_H0464:360b-20: snying nas slob dpon smod pa la //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-21: klu gzhug pa ni ji ltar lags //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-22: rdo rje can gyis bshad du gsol //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-23: klu'i lag na nad bcu gcig yod de /
K12D0499_H0464:360b-36: sa 'og gi rim pa bdun no //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-38: 'dzam bu'i gling na yang yod do //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-39: 'khor ni rnam pa bzhi dag gis //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-40: gtsang ma'i gos dag gyon nas ni //
K12D0499_H0464:360b-41: dkar gsum dag kyang bza' bar bya /
K12D0499_H0464:361a-0: @361a *// sngags rgyal nyis 'bum bzlas byas la //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-3: bdag nyid lag na rdo rje la //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-4: klu chen brgyad kyis bskor ba bri //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-5: de la sogs pa bshad zin to //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub phyogs su //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-7: klu yi gzugs gcig brtsam bya ste //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-9: mchod pa'i rdzas ni 'o ma sogs //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-10: dang po 'das pa'i mchod pa bya //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-11: spyan drang mchod dang bstod pa ni //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-12: cho ga bzhin du bya ba 'o //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-13: klu yi snying gar h'um bsgoms la //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-14: 'od zer rnam pa gsum dag gis /
K12D0499_H0464:361a-15: klu chen gnas nas dgug par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-16: gzugs brnyan de la bstims byas la //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-17: mchod pa dag gis mchod par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-18: gzugs brnyan g-yo ba 'byung ba na //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-19: sdang ba'i lus la gzhug bya ste //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-20: dbang po brgyad nas gzhug bya ste //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-21: brgyad cha tha ma'i dus dag tu //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-22: 'o ma gla rtsi kha ra yis //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-23: lam ni drang por drangs byas la //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-24: gong bu dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-25: de la klu chen gzhug par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-26: sgrub pa po yis gu gul bsten //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-27: gzugs la phur bus gdab par bya //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-28: des kyang grub par ma gyur na //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-29: lha yi rnam pa nyid dag la //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-30: spogs pa dag gi cho ga bzhin //
K12D0499_H0464:361a-33: n'a ga bi d'a ra n'a ya h'um/
K12D0499_H0464:361a-34: n'a ga bi d'a ra n'a ya /
K12D0499_H0464:361a-37: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
K12D0499_H0464:361a-38: sarba sha trum sam gha bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat/
K12D0499_H0464:361b-0: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra @361b badzra p'a ni

K12D0499_H0464:361b-8: n'a ga bi d'a r'a ya phat/
K12D0499_H0464:361b-9: n'a ga aut s'a da n'a ya phat/
K12D0499_H0464:361b-10: n'i l'am ba sa n'a ya phat/
K12D0499_H0464:361b-11: sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis khams gsum na gnas

K12D0499_H0464:361b-13: // de nas bcom ldan 'das brgyal ba sel ba
K12D0499_H0464:361b-14: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

K12D0499_H0464:361b-16: dbyung zhing brgyal ba sangs nas 'dar zhing thal mo
K12D0499_H0464:361b-17: sbyar nas ched du brjod pa /
K12D0499_H0464:361b-18: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing //
K12D0499_H0464:361b-19: gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'i //
K12D0499_H0464:361b-20: sngags dang ting 'dzin nus pa yis //
K12D0499_H0464:361b-21: sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzhal mi nus //
K12D0499_H0464:361b-22: rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
K12D0499_H0464:361b-23: klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12D0499_H0464:361b-24: de nas gtam rgyud bshad par bya ste /
K12D0499_H0464:361b-25: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos lha gnas
K12D0499_H0464:361b-26: rnam pa brgyad du rgyud thams cad bsdus nas ri
K12D0499_H0464:361b-27: rab kyi byang phyogs su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i
K12D0499_H0464:361b-28: rgyud gsungs so // de nas zhal gsum pa phyag
K12D0499_H0464:361b-29: drug pa'i sngags gsungs pas lha dang lha ma yin
K12D0499_H0464:361b-31: rig sngags 'chang de rnams ngo mtshar nas bstod pa byas so //
K12D0499_H0464:362a-0: de nas gling gi snying por 'khor gyi snying po gnod @362a *//
K12D0499_H0464:362a-2: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byon nas
K12D0499_H0464:362a-3: mar gyi snying po dang 'dra ba dam pa'i chos
K12D0499_H0464:362a-5: nyid kyi las gnyis kyi bdag nyid can rgyud sde stong phrag brgyad cu yang dag gsungs so //
